modules.description: Manages job submission and execution with automatic reconnection and rate-limited queuing, using a scheduler connection to handle job pools and prioritize tasks. Accepts job descriptions, pool names, and scheduling actions to dispatch work to a cluster. Enables logging and result retrieval for individual jobs through a dedicated interface.

Provides functions to build Docker images from Git commit IDs, with options for caching and specifying build context as either a string or file path. Supports building and pushing images to a target registry, as well as using an obuilder job specification for advanced builds. Works with Git commit IDs, Docker image and job specifications, and cluster-specific configuration.

Manages build worker pools and assigns jobs based on build type and platform, using Cap'n Proto for communication. Processes Dockerfile and OBuilder spec builds, associating each with a Git commit context. Schedules builds on workers that match the required platform and have relevant cache data.

handles job submission, execution, and monitoring within a cluster, along with Docker image building and deployment. it works with job specifications, Git commit IDs, and Docker images, offering features like job prioritization, logging, and image caching. it supports building images from source, pushing to registries, and managing cluster-specific configurations. examples include submitting a job for execution, building a Docker image from a commit, and retrieving job results.
